page.title: 14Home life contd.
page.content: 11a.m.Have coffee and load washer. 11.20a.m.Prepare dinner for 5.Remove meat from cold chicken,boil carcase for soup for tomorrow. 12.15p.m.Lunch_Bacon,fried potatoes,cabbage and peas for 5. 1p.m.Clear table,hang out more washing. 1.45p.m.Friend calls for cup of tea and 20mins. chat. 2p.m.Take sheep back to fields and start bringing in sheep from neighbours farm. 2.15p.m.Start picking peas in garden. telephone call for husband. 3.30p.m Youngest son arrives home asks if can phone friend to come and play.Listeen to youngest son read. 3.40p.m Neighbours child comes to play 3.45p.m.A rep. calls to see husband about minerals take to where they are dipping sheep.
